name: DOG GAME (VIDYA)
description:
June 42, 2005: You're just sitting around like the usual dog doing dog stuff. But while you were being busy, a portal to hell appears in the sky then you are sucked in with a shotgun.

You have to escape the fiery brimstone so you can go back home. The game features it's own soundtrack including with other's like PilotRedSun.
